overview:
Rob is a California tech pioneer and innovator. Rob has held senior positions in gaming, ecommerce and business intelligence. Notable companies include SEGA, Sony, Amgen, BizRate.com, Homestore.com, FreeCreditReport.com, Yahoo!, Edmunds.com and Tribune.

Rob helped found, fundraise and launch the water saving smart irrigation controller called cyber-rain.com

Rob is an advisor to two Los Angles companies.
